How many dumpsters are assigned to each house?
Who do I contact for Hale County citations given outside City Limits?

You would need to contact
[**Karen Davis**
,](http://cms2.revize.com/revize/halecountynew/judges_for_hale_county/justice_of_the_peace,_precinct_3.php)
Justice of the Peace for Precinct 3. Her contact number is (806) 757-2481 and office hours are
/
**Monday â€“ Friday**
.

What is the process for requesting a trailer?

The City of Abernathy has a limited number of trailers available to in-town utility customers for waste disposal. Trailer requests are handled in the order received and may take several days before one is delivered to your address.

To request a trailer,
**please complete the trailer request form on the
[Public Works webpage](https://cityofabernathy.org/#)**
or contact City Hall at
[**(806) 298-2546**](tel:8062982546)

If you are unsure about what can be loaded onto trailers, please contact City Hall. Please note:
.

Who do I contact about stray dogs and cats?

To check on a lost pet or report stray animals, please call
[**(806) 298-2546**](tel:8062982546)
during regular business hours. For incidents that occur after-hours, please
[**(806) 801-2700**](tel:8067786424)

How do I reserve City Hallâ€™s Community Room for an event?

To reserve the City Hallâ€™s Community Room, please contact
**(806) 298-2546**
. The deposit is currently set at $50 with a rental fee of $100.

What is the lunch hour period for the Cityâ€™s Library?

The lunch schedule for the Cityâ€™s library personnel is 1pm â€“ 2pm. Donations are also accepted by the Library Director in order to foster the growth of all Library programs.

For more Library information, please
[visit the Library webpage](https://cityofabernathy.org/your-government/library/)
.
